enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for Philosophy PhD Graduate Students

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course will cover some of the fundamental steps necessary to begin an academic career, including preparing for the application, CV, cover letter, writing sample, job talk, interview, and campus visit.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: The students will know how to present their own work in an engaging and persuasive manner and will have made substantial progress toward being ready to enter the job market the following academic year.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Materials from students will be shared on Canvas.
